title: Immortal Cultivator Riding the Emerald Dragon Wave
prompt: (Masterpiece), best quality, highly detailed digital illustration, (Xianxia style fantasy painting), a heroic cultivator dressed in flowing azure robes rides a gigantic, cresting turquoise wave. The wave glows internally with powerful emerald chi energy, manifesting as a swirling spectral dragon visible within the water's curl. Dynamic action shot, dramatic sunset sky with brilliant orange, pink, and purple clouds, sun rays breaking through the atmosphere. In the background, mysterious floating islands carrying ancient Chinese pagoda temples and glowing magical turquoise crystals hang high above the turbulent ocean. 16:9 aspect ratio, epic scale, strong lighting.
negativePrompt: lowres, bad anatomy, worst quality, error, extra limbs, jpeg artifacts, blurry, watermark, signature, text, monochrome, grayscale, modern surfboard, wires
